```

			sub( constant, reg );       // reg = reg - constant
sub( constant, memory );    // memory = memory - constant
sub( reg1, reg2 );          // reg2 = reg2 - reg1
sub( memory, reg );         // reg = reg - memory
sub( reg, memory );         // memory = memory - reg
```
